Patients equally randomize one four group receive antiretroviral therapy 24 week . Group 1 receives delavirdine ( DLV ) plus nelfinavir ( NFV ) plus stavudine ( d4T ) . Group 2 receive DLV plus NFV plus didanosine ( ddI ) . Group 3 receive NFV plus d4T plus ddI . Group 4 receive DLV plus NFV plus d4T plus ddI . Patients evaluated drug safety viral burden .
